title: Mathematics Learning Engagement Classification Training Using Deep Learning-Based Real-Time Feedback Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: A real-time feedback system integrated with digital devices, facilitating mathematics problem-solving projects

learning_goals: Students will be able to accurately classify their real-time engagement levels into one of four tiers (high/medium/low/very low) via a deep learning-based system.
Learners will improve math project efficiency by utilizing engagement-based personalized feedback provided by the system at least 85% of the time.
Students will be able to analyze engagement data over a six-month course to diagnose learning patterns and develop improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
